data: “Who’s at the front door?” asked Luella’s mother, coming in from the kitchen with a dish-towel in her hand.
“WHO’S at the front door?” asked Luella’s mother, coming in from the kitchen with a dish-towel in her hand.
Hill, Grace Livingston, 1865-1947; Atwood, Clara E., 1874-1963 [Illustrator]
